lesson_html:
• Hello! - A common way to greet someone.
  • How are you? - A friendly way to ask about someone's well-being.
  • Good morning/afternoon/evening! - Time-specific greetings to use throughout the day.
  • Nice to meet you! - A polite phrase used when meeting someone for the first time.
  • Goodbye! - A way to say farewell when parting ways.

items.explanation_en: This question asks about someone's recent state.

items.en: What time do you usually wake up?
items.explanation_en: This question inquires about someone's morning routine.

items.en: Do you have any plans for the weekend?

items.en: I hope you are doing well.

items.en: Are you enjoying your time here?

items.en: I look forward to seeing you soon.
items.explanation_en: This statement expresses anticipation for a future meeting.
